channel.description: Recent content in volatility on Optionally Bayes

item.title: Stochastic Volatility Models in Stan
item.description: Fitting 2 different Stochastic Volatility Models to S&P 500 returns and finding out which is better

item.title: Mixture Density Network for Forecasting Realized Volatility
item.description: Using a mixture density neural network implemented in PyTorch to forecast the distribution of future realized volatility.

item.title: Bayesian Autoregressive Volatility Forecasting
item.description: Using a simple bayesian autoregressive model to forecast future volatility

item.title: Comparison of Volatility Estimators
item.description: Comparing Garman-Klass estimator to 5-minute Realized Volatility estimator.
